Name: The Story of The Flood
About the game: Gods decide to bring the flood of water upon the earth. Salvage what you think is valuable and bring it back to base. It's a psychological test in the apocalypse, and an interactive experiment in making choices. Features More than 17 achievements & endings Over 17 alternate endings and Easter eggs are waiting to be dug out. Interactive puzzle visual novel Various alternate scenes and props interaction. A long mental journey Every survivor will shape their own doomsday story. Doomsday's artistic metaphor Every end of the journey is a reflection on humanity.
